title: In the News - The Center on Medical Product Access, Safety and Stewardship
sitename: The Center on Medical Product Access, Safety and Stewardship
cleaned_text: ROAR Urges Responsible Antibiotic Use During Get Smart About Antibiotics Week Nov 14-20 November 14th, 2016 According the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, each year in the United States, at least 2 million people become infected with bacteria that are resistant to antibiotics and at least 23,000 people die as a direct result of these infections....
